Name: Eastern Cape
Description: Known for its beaches, wildlife, and historical significance.

Name: Free State
Description: An agricultural hub with vast open plains.

Name: Gauteng
Description: The economic hub of South Africa, home to Johannesburg and Pretoria.

Name: KwaZulu-Natal
Description: A coastal region with a mix of mountains, beaches, and cultural heritage.

Name: Limpopo
Description: Bordering Zimbabwe and Mozambique, known for wildlife and agriculture.

Name: Mpumalanga
Description: Home to Kruger National Park and scenic landscapes.

Name: North West
Description: Rich in mining and natural reserves.

Name: Northern Cape
Description: The largest province by land area but sparsely populated.

Name: Western Cape
Description: Famous for Cape Town, wine regions, and coastal beauty.
